text: There are all sorts of wonderful jobs in London and I could take my pick, whereas in Yarmouth one has to know something about fishing and in Liverpool they'd want sea-farers. I don't think I'd go to Edinburgh unless I was a Scot and wanting to get that.
handwritten_text: There are all sorts of wonderful jobs in London and I could take my pick, whereas in Yarmouth one has to know something about fishing and in Liverpool they'd want sea-farers. I don't think I'd go to Edinburgh unless I was a Scot and wanting to get that.
